Chapter 2 本书使用软件信息

Chapter 2 本书使用软件信息 本书使用的R session信息列在下面: xfun::session_info(c( 'blogdown', 'bookdown', 'knitr', 'rmarkdown', 'htmltools', 'reticulate', 'rticles', 'flexdashboard', 'learnr', 'shiny', 'revealjs', 'pkgdown', 'tinytex', 'xaringan', 'tufte' ), dependencies = FALSE) ## R version 3.6.0 (2019-04-26) ## Platform: x86_64-w64-mingw32/x64 (64-bit) ## Running under: Windows 10 x64 (build 18363), RStudio 1.2.5019 ## ## Locale: ## LC_COLLATE=English_United States.1252 LC_CTYPE=English_United States.1252 ## LC_MONETARY=English_United States.1252 LC_NUMERIC=C ## LC_TIME=English_United States.1252 ## ## Package version: ## blogdown_0.17 bookdown_0.16 flexdashboard_0.5.1.1 htmltools_0.4.0 ## knitr_1.26 learnr_0.10.1 pkgdown_1.4.1 reticulate_1.14 ## revealjs_0.9 rmarkdown_2.0 rticles_0.14 shiny_1.4.0 ## tinytex_0.19 tufte_0.5 xaringan_0.14 ## ## Pandoc version: 2.7.2 包的名字使用黑体(例如:rmarkdown).函数后面会跟着括号(比如:blogdown::serve_site()).“Rmd”是Rmarkdown文件的扩展名,同时也是R markdown的缩写. This is a sample book written in Markdown. You can use anything that Pandoc’s Markdown supports, e.g., a math equation \(a^2 + b^2 = c^2\). The bookdown package can be installed from CRAN or Github:
